original_title: Re-scrutinised results of two exams to be released today
original_body_lines: The re-scrutinised results of two national exams are due to be released this afternoon (26 May), the Commissioner General of Exams said.

Accordingly, the re-scrutinised results of the 2021 G.C.E Ordinary Level exam and the results of the appeals on the Grade 05 scholarship exam will be released this afternoon, H. J. M. Amith Jayasundara said.
